note: Here is an example: var dtBlogDateTime:DateTime = new DateTime(); dtBlogDateTime.parseDateTime(“2003-07-17T00:19:05-05:00”);
title: Parsing a Date String into a DateTime Object In many scenarios, you can retrieve a string that represents a date. You can use the parseDateTime() method to parse the string into a DateTime object. The example method parses strings such as 2003-07-17T00:19:05-05:00
